Improve placement of accessory buttons when widget is small
Fix today widget recognizing touches when scrolling between pages
Add modern battery widget
make it easier to create custom modern widget view controllers for developers
Fix insufficient space widgets filtering to not include widgets whose instance limit has been reached
Make it easier for developers to set the corner radius of custom widgets
Fix widgets being lost on respring due to reduced motion being enabled or when another tweak disables fly in animation
Improve UI of widget selection to make it easier to understand when widgets are disabled
Redesigned to provide custom widget shapes instead of being restricted to rows
Add ability to have unique preferences per widget and display them right along the widget
Add iOS 13 and arm64e compatibility
Improve compatibility with iPad
Improve today widget loading
Add preferences for Clock and Today Widgets
Add Photo Widget for iOS 13, thanks to Tr1fecta
Improve API and provide docs for developers to implement their own custom widgets
Improved zoom to center animation for widgets
Force reconnect today widgets after 12 hours
Improve today widget loadign after respring for iOS 11+
Rewrote today widget from scratch to get better compatibility with iOS 11+
Improve compatibility with JellyFish (not completely compatible just yet)
Fix icon moving issues with tweaks that modify the number of rows on home screen
Display HSWidgets alphabetically in the Add new widget view
Fix widgets expansion/shrink causing size issues with multiple widgets on the same page
Add more layout configuration options (view Layout Configuration link for more information)
Added A12 device (arm64e) compatibility
Rewrote clock widget from scratch to get better compatibility with iOS 11+
Fix widgets not being saved correctly when whole pages are removed/shifted
Fix crashes on some devices
Improve widget loading
Added option to expand/shrink clock widget
Added material view background to today widgets for iOS 11+
Fix "X" not showing when going into wiggle mode.
